title: Trimming, 18th century
medium:
Medium: gold metallic foil and gold metallic foil wound onto yellow silk
Technique: bobbin lace
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Wide ribbons densely placed in a serpentine pattern.
